contentrichtext.text: {{coord|1|17|42.41|N|103|48|01.76|E|display=title|region:SG_type:landmark}} '''Queensway Base''' is home of [[Special Operations Command (Singapore)|Special Operations Command]] (SOC), part of the [[Singapore Police Force]] (SPF). This place is gazetted as a protected place and is situated directly across the road from the [[Singapore Police Force#Defunct Units/Facilities|Old Queenstown Police Station]]. Units such as Police Light Strike Force, Police KINS Training Camp, Police Tactical Unit and STAR (Special Tactics And Rescue) team are located here. The address is as follows: Queensway Base <br> Queensway, [[Singapore]] 149051<br> Tel : 64790000<br> Fax : 64744129 or 64746102 ==External links== *[http://app.sgdi.gov.sg/listing.asp?agency_subtype=dept&agency_id=0000001071 List of contact information] {{Singapore Police Force}} [[Category:Singapore Police Force]] [[Category:Special Operations Command (Singapore)]] {{Singapore-stub}} {{law-enforcement-stub}}
